MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY18 postcode area of Llanidloes, affecting properties in Cefn Road, Glen Y Nant and surrounding areas. The power cut has been caused by a tree on the overhead lines and repairs are taking longer than expected because of the weather conditions.  Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:58AM on 31st October 2020
